description:
Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO movie! Gamma 1, Gamma 2, and Gohan (DBS Super Hero) are available in addition to new movie-related Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, and much more! 

HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 1
• 3 New Playable Characters: Gamma 1, Gamma 2, Gohan (DBS Super Hero)
• 4 New Parallel Quests
• 7 Additional Moves
• 4 Costumes/Accessories
• 5 Super Souls
• 15 Illustrations

*Some of the above content can be obtained by meeting certain conditions in the game.
name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 1
